# This file will be automatically generated the first time you run the script, you do not need to manually create this file.

# Path to the Excel log file where metadata will be recorded
ExcelLogPath=C:\Users\YourName\Documents\ImageLogs\Copyrighted.xlsx

# Folder where the script should save ZIP files
ZipSavePath=C:\Users\YourName\Documents\ImageZips

# Name of the TXT file written to the image source folder (per run)
TextLogFileName=Copyright-Data.txt

# Temporary JPEG conversion folder (auto-deleted each run) THIS FOLDER WILL BE DELETED
TempJPEGPath=C:\Users\YourName\Documents\ImageLogs\TempDir-AutoDelete
